verses.verse: Not unto us, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, not unto us, but unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%>, for thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, and for thy <S%H571>truth's<s%> sake.
Wherefore should the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, Where is now their <S%H430>God<s%>?
But our <S%H430>God<s%> is in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>: he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> whatsoever he hath <S%H2654>pleased<s%>.
They have <S%H6310>mouths<s%>, but they <S%H1696>speak<s%> not: <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have they, but they <S%H7200>see<s%> not:
They have <S%H241>ears<s%>, but they <S%H8085>hear<s%> not: <S%H639>noses<s%> have they, but they <S%H7306>smell<s%> not:
They have <S%H3027>hands<s%>, but they <S%H4184>handle<s%> not: <S%H7272>feet<s%> have they, but they <S%H1980>walk<s%> not: neither <S%H1897>speak<s%> they through their <S%H1627>throat<s%>.
They that <S%H6213>make<s%> them are like unto them; so is every one that <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in them.
O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H982>trust<s%> thou in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: he is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield<s%>.
O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: he is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield<s%>.
Ye that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: he is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield<s%>.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath been <S%H2142>mindful<s%> of us: he will <S%H1288>bless<s%> us; he will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; he will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>.
He will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3254>increase<s%> you more and more, you and your <S%H1121>children<s%>.
Ye are <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>.
The <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, even the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, are the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%>: but the <S%H776>earth<s%> hath he <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.
The <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> not the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>, neither any that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H1745>silence<s%>.
But we will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> from this time forth and <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>evermore<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>.
